name: That Room
description:
This game was made in 3 days for the Indie Tales jam with the theme "only one room"

I didn't wanna go all out for this one so I made a short story game about a boy trying to remember what happened in a room that he sees in his dreams

I probably could have executed the story a bit better with more time but that's just how game jams go

MINOR TRIGGER WARNING FOR BLOOD
